text: Blair Millar (born 16 October 1956), is a Scottish former footballer, who played for Clydebank, Airdrieonians and Kilmarnock. ==External links== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Paisley, Renfrewshire Category:Scottish footballers Category:Clydebank F.C. players Category:Airdrieonians F.C. title: Blair Millar
